assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The course gives an overview of basic methods for prevention of social problems of pupils and for intervention in the case these problems emerge at individual, group and school level.
description.et: Kursus annab ülevaate põhilisest meetoditest kuidas ennetada õpilastel sotsiaalseid probleeme ja sekkuda nende probleemide ilmnemisel, lähtudes indiviidi, grupi ja kogu kooli tasandilt.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to give students methodological principles for prevention and intervention of pupils' social problems with pedagogical means.
objectives.et: Eesmärgiks on anda üliõpilastele metoodilised oskused, kuidas ennetada ja sekkuda pedagoogiliste vahenditega õpilastel ilmnevate sotsiaalsete probleemide korral.

learning_outcomes.en: On completing the course a student will be able to:
- demonstrate understanding of mean methots of social pedagogy in educational context;
learning_outcomes.et: - omab teadmisi erinevatest sotsiaalpedagoogilstest meetoditest hariduslikus kontekstis;

learning_outcomes.en: - evaluate, analyze and have a willingness to apply different prevention and intervention strategies in individual, group and whole school level originated from socialpedagogical viewpoint.
learning_outcomes.et: - hindab, analüüsib ja omab valmidust rakendada erinevaid ennetus- ja sekkumismetoodikaid indiviidi, grupi ja kogu kooli haaraval tasemel sotsiaalpedagoogika vaatevinklist.
